reviews.customers_say: Customers find these pajamas comfortable, well-made, and appreciate their high-quality cotton material, with one customer noting they're suitable for sensitive skin. The fabric is soft, and customers like the style, with pretty colors. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some find them true to size, others mention the pants are too short, and while some say they're true to size, others report they shrin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost missed this!!
items.body: Wow these are probably the nicest Jammie’s I’ve purchased for myself!! They fit great. The fabric is soft and feels rather like I’m at a luxurious hotel spa! They are soft and comfortable! They wash up nice. I was looking for something other than the knit stretchy pjs. All they have now are knit ones with either fleece or spandex/stretchy fabric. I prefer a nice cotton or cotton blend. These are 100% cotton. They wash up nicely with no shrinkage. I just wish there were more colors. Read more
items.author: Mo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO SOFT AND COMFY NOT LIKE PLASTIC TRASG
items.body: These are SO COMFY!! I have SEVERE hot flashes, and bought these along with organic Cotton sheets to try to help this. These pjs have kept me cool and dry! I will be buying more in different colors! True to size! Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!
items.body: These are very comfortable and durable. At 5'4' 170 lb., ordered size XL which fit as desired after washing without excessive shrinkage. One star off for the slippery ribbon used as drawstring, which is too slippery to easily use. However, will buy this again! Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Breathable pajamas
items.body: These are really comfortable and classy looking, and I ordered because they are cotton. I ordered a size up (bought a large) based on other reviews. They were maybe a little big at first but they drew up a little since they’re cotton. Good purchase for the money. Read more
items.author: waltzing_matilda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic PJs!!
items.body: Wow these are the best PJs I have ever had! Been looking for good 100% cotton PJs saw these and took a chance and purchased them. Promptly ordered two more pairs different colors! VERY high quality cotton very luxurious and they feel wonderful when worn. Truly love these!! It’s hard to find good quality women’s PJs but these are superb quality and comfort!!! Read more
items.author: L'escribe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cool
items.body: Very comfy and keeps my body cool. It did not shrink after multiple washes. High quality material. I recommend this product and would buy it again. Read more
items.author: Karoline

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Will shrink after first wash
items.body: Sleeves are short or maybe I’m just tall I’m 5’7 and I’m 135lbs, it isn’t see through, it is soft and comfortable, very cute, my only problem is I washed it in cold water, let it air dry and both the top and bottom shrunk, for the price of this I expected it to hold up better after washing. Read more
items.author: Janine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommend
items.body: Love these pajamas. Both fit and quality were great! I wanted breathable cotton and found them to be soft with just the right amount of stretch. I highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Prairiedog

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Fuchsia, Army Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Deep Grey, Lavender, Rose Pink, Turquoise, Sky Blue, Blue, Sage Green, Coral Orange, Green Santa Claus. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
